intro: Jussieuia herbacea, commonly known as the brittlestemmed jussieuia, is a flowering plant belonging to the family Malvaceae. It is characterized by its herbaceous growth habit and slender, often hairy stems. The plant produces small, inconspicuous flowers that are typically clustered in inflorescences. Its leaves are simple, alternate, and often have a rough texture. Jussieuia herbacea is typically found in moist, sandy soils in tropical and subtropical regions.
